sense.def:
To glance at something
pomeni nekaj zelo na hitro pogledati in se potem ozreti proč.

seg.quote: Rudolph glanced around to make sure nobody was watching.
He cast a quick glance at his friend.

sense.def:
To glance through or at a newspaper or book
pomeni malo časa gledati časopis ali knjigo, ne da bi jo pazljivo brali.

seg.quote: During breakfast he glances through the morning paper.

sense.def:
Če nekaj vidimo ali prepoznamo
at a glance
, to storimo takoj.

seg.quote: She can tell at a glance whether they are married.
